description:
What types of advertisements and digital media catch your attention and peak your interest? Would you like to learn how to create and communicate effective digital designs? Are you interested in learning more about how to communicate your creative ideas in a way that will capture the attention of your audience? Then this course is for you!

Organizations hire digital design professionals—in part, for their creative talents; but ultimately—to solve problems. So what principles, processes, and tools should you have in your creative, visual problem-solving toolkit? In this course, you will consider how designers think; how design approaches, processes, and tools might vary for different mediums; and how to communicate a story through design.
title: Exploring Digital Design
